name: Life is like...
description:
Life is like... a video game. Or is it? 

Maybe it's more like a deck of cards, or a box of chocolate. Whatever it is, you won't find the answers here. Or will you?

No probably not. But if there's one lesson here, it's that you need to shoot and blow up the bad, negative things in your life.

  • RMB - USE ITEM
  • MID MB - PAUSE
  • LMB - CLICKS STUFF

Game submission for Mouse Jam 2 (8 Bits to Infinity) https://discord.gg/umzMXNq

Solo Project - Kal / Plunge In Games (Discord: Kal#7666)

@PlungeInGames
